Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Schulte-Cloos, Julia (2021). ReproducR: Drafting and publishing reproducible scientific articles with R Markdown. R package version 0.1, https://github.com/jschultecloos/reproducr. 

@Manual{,
  title = {ReproducR: Drafting and publishing reproducible scientific articles with R Markdown},
  author = {{Schulte-Cloos} and {Julia}},
  year = {2021},
  note = {R package version 0.1},
  url = {https://github.com/jschultecloos/reproducr},
}

Authors

  • Julia Schulte-Cloos. Author, maintainer.

reproducr is built for R Markdown, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. Learn more at rmarkdown.rstudio.com.

Developed by Julia Schulte-Cloos. Site built with pkgdown.
